page.title: 09Around Varna St.,Openshaw
page.content: In the area around our school,Higher Openshaw,Manchester,there are mostly terraced houses and open,landscaped, grass spaces.There used to be houses on the spaces but they got knocked down because they were not fit to live in.By the side of our school there is an electric railway line which runs from Manchester to Glossop.At the back of our school there is a branch of the Stockport and Ashton Canal which has been filled in and made into a footpath.There are some factories around our school.One factory called Laurence Scotts,which made steel,was closed down and the people lost their jobs.The Smithfield Market,which is a large wholesale fruit and vegetable market,is also at the back of our school.Next door to our school is the High Bank Industrial Estate which has all different kinds of businesses.
